name: PingFang Chinese for Nick
css:
/* Simplified Chinese Sites */
@-moz-document 
domain("cn"),
domain("chanyouji.com"),
domain("niting.com"),
domain("looooker.com"),
domain("mydrivers.com"),
domain("luo.bo"),
domain("hao24.cn"),
domain("xunlei.com"),
domain("chinesepen.org"),
domain("upyun.com"),
domain("jd-bbs.com"),
domain("mittrchinese.com"),
domain("weiphone.com"),
domain("ifeng.com"),
domain("devtang.com"),
domain("niaogebiji.com"),
domain("bwchinese.com"),
domain("163.com"),
domain("360buy.com"),
domain("36kr.com"),
domain("21cn.com"),
domain("265.com"),
domain("51.com"),
domain("89890.com"),
domain("91.com"),
domain("92wy.com"),
domain("baihe.com"),
domain("baidu.com"),
domain("blogbus.com"),
domain("chinahr.com"),
domain("chinaren.com"),
domain("cnbeta.com"),
domain("cngba.com"),
domain("cnodejs.org"),
domain("csdn.com"),
domain("csdn.net"),
domain("diandian.com"),
domain("donews.com"),
domain("fanfou.com"),
domain("google.cn"),
domain("infoq.com"),
domain("infzm.com"),
domain("it168.com"),
domain("itpub.net"),
domain("kaixin001.com"),
domain("maiyadi.com"),
domain("mop.com"),
domain("netease.com"),
domain("oschina.net"),
domain("people.com.cn"),
domain("qq.com"),
domain("renren.com"),
domain("sina.com"),
domain("sina.com.cn"),
domain("sohu.com"),
domain("sogou.com"),
domain("tgbus.com"),
domain("tianya.cn"),
domain("tianya.com"),
domain("tom.com"),
domain("verycd.com"),
domain("cn.yahoo.com"),
domain("youku.com"),
domain("xiaonei.com"),
domain("ycool.com"),
domain("zaobao.com"),
domain("duowan.com"),
domain("zol.com"),
domain("zol.com.cn"),
domain("caixin.com"),
domain("zhihu.com"),
domain("douban.com"),
domain("xiami.com"),
domain("twitter.com"),
domain("facebook.com"),
domain("jobbole.com"),
domain("icenci.com"),
domain("timeoutcn.com"),
domain("numbbbbb.gitbooks.io"),
domain("cocoachina.com"),
domain("segmentfault.com"),
domain("feedly.com"),
domain("asahichinese.com"),
domain("battle.net"),
domain("a9vg.com"),
domain("goprocn.com"),
domain("ruanyifeng.com"),
domain("10010.com"),
domain("cnblogs.com"),
domain("cn.wsj.com"),
domain("leiphone.com"),
domain("iosre.com"),
domain("nickcheng.com")
{
* { font-family: "PingFang SC", LeanCloud, octicons, icons, "Glyphicons Halflings", hcom-icons, arkicons, fontello, ilmenicons, frodo, FontAwesome, sans-serif !important; }
}

/* For weibo.com */
@-moz-document 
domain("weibo.com")
{
body { font-family: "PingFang SC", "Glyphicons Halflings", arkicons, fontello, frodo, FontAwesome, sans-serif !important; }
}

/* Traditional Chinese Sites */
@-moz-document 
domain("hk"),
domain("tw"),
domain("discuss.com.hk"),
domain("facekoo.com"),
domain("google.com.hk"),
domain("google.com.tw"),
domain("ithome.com.tw"),
domain("on.cc"),
domain("udn.com"),
domain("uwants.com"),
domain("hk.myblog.yahoo.com"),
domain("hk.news.yahoo.com"),
domain("hk.yahoo.com"),
domain("tw.yahoo.com"),
domain("tw.news.yahoo.com"),
domain("tw.battle.net"),
domain("lrthw.github.io"),
domain("pixnet.net"),
domain("hilive.tv"),
domain("asia.playstation.com"),
domain("nikkei.com"),
domain("techbang.com")
{
* { font-family: "PingFang TC", "Glyphicons Halflings",hcom-icons, fontello, arkicons, ilmenicons, frodo, FontAwesome,sans-serif !important; }
}
